title: Dark Horse
description: He needed it.The new job.The new city. The new life.The second chance. And nothing could stand in his way.Except, maybe, the sexy as hell spitfire he found himself suddenly in competition with for a job he thought was his.Amongst trying to begin again, office politics, and a case that wasn’t quite what it seemed, he needed to try to keep his mind off the spirited Espen, a task that was going to prove extremely difficult…
author: Jessica Gadziala
